ğŸ“ RECOMMENDED USAGE

â€¢ For headers, presskits, and full-color media â†’ use **StudioRich_Logo_Red**
â€¢ For dark backgrounds â†’ use **White**
â€¢ For light backgrounds â†’ use **Black**
â€¢ For favicons, icons, or UI â†’ consider simplifying or omitting highlights
â€¢ For print or merchandise â†’ use the **SVG** version for clarity

âŒ DO NOT

â€¢ Stretch, squash, or rotate the mark
â€¢ Place it on cluttered backgrounds
â€¢ Recolor the red emblem â€” it's part of our signature
â€¢ Add shadows or glows unless part of an approved glitch style
â€¢ Use the head scratch as a joke (itâ€™s battle-tested, not comic relief)
